Title: Mameshiba
Description: ["In these short animated clips, little dog-faced talking beans appear in people's food and inform them about different facts."]
Related: ['Other: Gintama x Mameshiba', 'Spin-off: Mameshiba Gakuen', 'Side story: Henna Omamesan']
Characters: ['Tiger Bean', 'Coffee Bean', 'Jelly Bean', 'Green Pea', 'Nut, Cashew', 'Bean, Chilli']
